title_localized.en: Can I make a group reservation?

faq_content_localized.en: Apple Core Hotels takes group reservations and offers special pricing. To personally reserve more than 4 rooms for your group, contact our Groups Coordinator at 800.567.7720 (within U.S.A.) or +1 212.790.2742 (international), or send your inquiry to Group.Reservations@applecorehotels.com. A seasoned member of our sales team will promptly get back to you to help fill your request for group accommodations.
